casebody.data:
PHILIP MORRIS USA INC., petitioner,
v.
Mary BROWN, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Rayfield Brown. No. 18-552. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 25, 2019. Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District denied. Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
